text: Quakertown is a borough in Bucks County, Pennsylvania, United States. As of the 2020 census, 9,359 people lived here. The borough is south of Allentown and north of Philadelphia. Quakertown is on the border of both the Delaware Valley and Lehigh Valley metropolitan areas. Actress and singer Sabrina Carpenter was born here. == References == Category:Boroughs in Pennsylvania
title: Quakertown, Pennsylvania
